title: 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Condo In West Loop Chicago With Great Amenities
map_address: 1224 West Van Buren Street near Racine and Van Buren
posting_body: ["Bright and sunny 2 bed (1 master bed + 1office/den) + 1 bath apartment located in the heart of Chicago's popular West Loop Neighborhood.", 'High ceilings and floor to ceiling windows across the entire living room allow for great natural light perfect for a plant parent!', 'This concrete loft has a kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast bar overlooking the front room.', "This unit features hardwood floors throughout, with carpet in bedrooms, large living room, 2 bedrooms with the smaller being perfect for a Den/Office or children's room.", '1 oversized bathroom with dual vanities and a massive mirror, tons of closet space, central heat/ac, dishwasher, garbage disposal, in unit washer/dryer & a private balcony!', 'The building includes a rooftop sun deck, bike storage, secured entry with doorman & a yoga/fitness room!', 'Walking distance to all the best West Loop has to offer: restaurants, shopping, parks, and conveniently located across the street from the Racine Blue Line stop for easy Loop access.', 'Near the Medical District, Skinner Elementary School and UIC Campus, Target across the street, Whole Foods and Marianos are nearby.', 'Available 8/24.', 'Parking available for rent in the building.', 'In-person and virtual tours are available!', 'Tenant responsible for Gas, Electric and Cable/Internet.', 'Monthly Rent: $2445']
